info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 11:38AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chesterfield and Prince George Counties, the City of Colonial Heights, the City of Hopewell and the City of Petersburg through 1230 PM EDT... At 1137 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colonial Heights, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Petersburg, Hopewell, Colonial Heights, Virginia State University, Chester, Disputanta, Fort Lee, Prince George, Matoaca, Burrowsville, Garysville, Ettrick, Jordans Point, Birchett Estate, Jordan Point Country Club, Petersburg National Battlefield, New Bohemia, Richard Bland College, Prince George Golf and Centralia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
